item.title: Google Plans to Roll Out Gemini A.I. Chatbot to Children Under 13 - The New York Times
item.description:
1. Google Plans to Roll Out Gemini A.I. Chatbot to Children Under 13  The New York Times
  2. Report: Google will put Gemini AI in the hands of kids under 13  Mashable
  3. My son is going to be so excited that Gemini will soon be available on his phone  Chrome Unboxed
  4. Kids under 13 will soon get supervised access to Google Gemini  Engadget
  5. Google is going to let kids use its Gemini AI  The Verge
